name: Electric Runt
description:
Prototype made on a jam, expect bugs and not high quality

WTF is that?

Well.. This game was meant to be something like a survival,  but lack of personal free time and now we have this, its still pretty good for small session though!

What to do?

Grab runts and objects with LMB
Put flying electric runts into energy station (plate-like thing)
Press F to connect energy station to other stations
Each station to work needs 1 runt in connected energy station
Get raw materials by pressing F
Put logs, metal, stone into work stations to craft materials
Ooops... you can't do anything with materials yet :C

But you can have fun with runts, they're really cute!

Also there is sphere device to grab multiple materials and runts!

Controls: 

Tab - Lock/Unlock mouse
Mouse Movement - Camera Rotation
LMB - Grab object
F - Interact
Space - Move Up
Left Ctrl - Move Down
V - "Space Mode"
Q, E - Additional rotation
